name: Crazy Chain (KrazyK)
description:
CRAZY CHAIN

Unchained evil lurks in the night ...

Play as Chain Chonah Chainson in this action-packed monster slaughtering game. Obliterate demonic trees, collect power-ups, and stay alive as long as you can by chaining kills. You have 10 seconds to keep up your streak or it's game over. See how far you can go!

Made by the following at Crowbyte Games:

Programming and mechanics by Kyle.

Fracture physics by Chris.

Models and animations by Avery.

Music, sounds, and voice lines by Shea.

Theme and ideas by Jaleel.

A few assets are from Unreal's Starter Pack.

Made for the 2023 SNHU Game Jam.  Made in over 48 hours under the theme of Chains.

Controls:

WASD  -  Move

Left Click  -  Use Chainsaw

Space  -  Jump

Right Click  -  Zoom

Left Control  -  Crouch

F  -  Flashlight

M  -  Toggle Cursor Color
